achievements.name: saff-FC
achievements.unlockCondition: achieve a full combo on saff
achievements.showmanDialogue: That little girl in the purple hat is an enigma! My showroom has top of the line security, and somehow she managed to sneak on stage! That's due for a lifetime ban! And yet, she disappeared just as soon as she arrived. Kids these days...

achievements.name: SUPERFAN-FC
achievements.unlockCondition: Achieve a Full Combo on SUPERFAN
achievements.showmanDialogue: The tea shops in Togarashi's Backstreets are quite lovely. I'd pay patronage to them more often, but they tend to be a little... small for me. Perhaps those mass renovations will fix that particular issue right up?
